title: Total War: Arena - Leonidas - #3 - Hammer and anvil
description:
Jackie and I visit Total War Arena once again.  This time we face a heavy resistance on the battlefield of Marathon.  We are out numbered, but hope is not lost.  Hopefully tactics can save the day :D..enjoy

p.s.  For Whatever reason my mic is really quite and jackie's is really loud.  Im really sorry about that, but its not too bad.  I will be sure to fix that in future videos

Jackies channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Jackiefishhhhhh 


Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/pixelatedapollo
How to send me battle replays: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nG3uZoDkCU
How to play Medieval 2 Online: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YGfItCMitPg
